akn:section.akn:heading: Program to monitor Department of Energy workers exposed to hazardous and radioactive substances

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary of Energy shall establish and carry out a program for the identification and on-going medical evaluation of current and former Department of Energy employees who are subject to significant health risks as a result of the exposure of such employees to hazardous or radioactive substances during such employment.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Agreement with Secretary of Health and Human Services

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Agreement with Secretary of Health and Human Services Not later than April 23, 1993, the Secretary shall enter into an agreement with the Secretary of Health and Human Services relating to the establishment and conduct of the program required and regulations issued under this section.
